synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: hydrated Tb(MeCOO)3, Eu(MeCOO)3 in desired ratios, PhCOOH
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Tb/Eu ratio in the heteronuclear samples was determined by ICP analysis.

synthesis_conditions.equipment: Ultrasonic Cleaner VWR and EBA 21 Hettich Zentrifugen machine for centrifugation
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Presence of nanosheets in all obtained suspensions was demonstrated by the Tyndall effect.
